overview: Over the span of her career, Ms. Ferman has held finance, strategy and operations positions within major U.S. media and entertainment companies such as Time Warner and The Walt Disney Company. Most recently, she served as Vice President, Strategy for NBC Universal’s Local Media division where she was responsible for formulating divisional strategic plans, executing on revenue generating business initiatives and cross-platform content partnerships as well as implementing operational improvements. She brings to Remark Media a broad range of discipline experience including television, film, publishing, cable distribution, digital and social media. Ms. Ferman holds a Master of Business Administration from Dartmouth College and a Bachelor of Arts in Economics from University of California, Los Angeles.
